}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *802.11ac Dual Band with High Gain Antenna :802.11 b/g/n @2.4GHz 300Mbps :802.11 a/n/ac @5.0GHz 867Mbps *Faster access with USB 3.0, compatible with USB 2.0
[[Netgear]]'s drivers seem to indicate this device is using MT7612U. :The chipset vendor + specs. fit, so it's assumed to be so..
[[Category:English Documentation]]
